info.brief_description: Turn a girl from Buffy The Vampire Slayer back into a baby.
info.description:
Another story inspired by Themaster223's works, this time focusing around the ladies of Buffy: The Vampire Slayer.
Rules.
No drugs.
No insulting religions, races and so on.

Gross things stay in the diapers.
Chapteres will be edited if I feel they may be too over the top.

Have fun.
